DOC.brief_summary: To compare the outcomes of patients treated with the Vest and conventional chest physiotherapy to determine if the Vest provides equivalent therapy
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of High-Frequency Chest Wall Oscillation
DOC.criteria: Acute or chronic disease requiring secretion mobilization as per hospital protocol Absolute contraindications for positional changes Absolute contraindications for chest percussion Women visibly pregnant Previous enrollment in study Previous CPT or Vest treatment
